original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added documentation for runner scale sets in GitHub Actions.
- Restructured Actions Runner Controller (ARC) content into tutorials.
- Enabled PKCE support for GitHub Apps and OAuth apps.
- Enhanced Copilot tutorial with hands-on exercise.
- Clarified GitHub Pages visibility rules for Enterprise Managed Users.
- Rolled out new AI-powered search experience universally.
- Updated REST and webhook schemas with new fields.
